item.title: Dog mess on inside of pavement on Knapp Road, 23rd July
item.description:

item.title: Large unsightly graffiti on railway bridge on both side of the road, 23rd July
item.description:
Large Graffiti has appeared on the bridge on both side of the road along the A40 from Elmbridge court roundabout towards the old C&G roundabout. this is a new thing as this area is normally clear of this. It really needs to be removed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
